full_text: Lotus is a short-sleeved blouse with a characteristic Nordic pattern on the circular yoke. The lovely floral motif of the pattern is inspired by Lotus flowers, that symbolize pureness of mind and soul. A short-sleeved sweater with the characteristic Nordic pattern border on the yoke. The beautiful floral pattern is reminiscent of the white lotus flower, which symbolizes the purity of mind and soul. A short blouse with a Nordic characteristic design has a beautiful design. The small flower part is inspired by the high-quality lotus flower, which symbolizes the flowers and the flowers.
name: Ravelry: Lotus pattern by Hanne Rimmen
